title: Account Suspended
body: On 09/19/16, I have received a email stating that I am suspended from League of Legends until 02/22/17 for violating the terms of service. The thing is that I have not been on my account for a few months. I don't have a PC atm. I've sent in a support ticket. But I made a mistake and set the language to Spanish. I don't even know if I sent it to the right place. Could I get some help here?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=King Hirocan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=lnaYhQAr,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-09-19T22:43:23.189+0000)
>
> On 09/19/16, I have received a email stating that I am suspended from League of Legends until 02/22/17 for violating the terms of service. The thing is that I have not been on my account for a few months. I don&#039;t have a PC atm. I&#039;ve sent in a support ticket. But I made a mistake and set the language to Spanish. I don&#039;t even know if I sent it to the right place. Could I get some help here?

Yeah, I've been hacked. I looked around and found out that I have match history from games I cannot have played. I've changed my password word. But I still am suspended for things I didn't do. I need some help ASAP. It seems like someone got into my account a few days ago. I have match history from about 4 days ago. I don't even have a computer to play League atm.

Even if you accidentally selected the wrong language, your ticket will get sent to the right place. One of our account specialists will get back to you as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have any questions.
